DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate whether specific visuospatial training task change gait performance Parkinson 's disease ( PD ) patient doorway , specifically freeze gait .
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize , prospective , single-blinded six-week study PD patient freeze gait ( FOG ) . This study involve 2 study group : Group A - training group ; Group B - training group/controls . Both group complete gait evaluation neuropsychological testing . Group A also practice in-home visuospatial task 30 minute , 4-6 day per week six week . Group B complete in-home task . Participation study expect last 6-8 week .
